column1: Kata Robata////Uni and Black Truffle Soba: buckwheat soba
column7: wasabi vinaigrette-- flavors again combining very well and perfect mixing of textures.  same with yuzu marinated salmon--roasted cauliflower mousse was a great touch.  toro good and texas hamachi roll tiny
column8: compact but also good.  great dessert tres leches crossed with strawberry shortcake
column9: so less liquidity than traditional tres leches. had good service
